abstract: Returns an array of font family names available on the system.
overview:
## Return Value

An array of `NSString` objects, each of which contains the name of a font family.

## Discussion

Font family names correspond to the base name of a font, such as `Times New Roman`. You can pass the returned strings to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont/fontNames(forFamilyName:)] method to retrieve a list of font names available for that family. You can then use the corresponding font name to retrieve an actual font object.

# familyNames

**Type Property**

Returns an array of font family names available on the system.

## Declaration

```swift
class var familyNames: [String] { get }
```

## Return Value

An array of `NSString` objects, each of which contains the name of a font family.

## Discussion

Font family names correspond to the base name of a font, such as `Times New Roman`. You can pass the returned strings to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFont/fontNames(forFamilyName:)] method to retrieve a list of font names available for that family. You can then use the corresponding font name to retrieve an actual font object.

## Getting the Available Font Names

- **fontNames(forFamilyName:)**: Returns an array of font names available in a particular font family.
